Fun game with a high skill ceiling, as to be expected with any highly competitive game, the comp scene is incredibly toxic like league of legends, or dota, etc. If you aren't pulling your weight in a game your team mates will let you know. Very hard for people just getting into the game, but if you can get passed that it's worth it.
